data.title: Great Meal!
data.text: My husband and I enjoyed a delicious meal at Tresetti's before an evening event at the Gallo Performing Arts Center.  My husband's steak was cooked to perfection.  My crab cakes were yummy and served with a delightful tartar sauce.  Green beans and mashed potatoes were fresh and plentiful.  The Chocolate Silk pie with walnut crust was exquisite and made in house.  Service was friendly and unpretentious.  Excellent downtown foodie venue.

data.title: High quality dinner
data.text: Tresetti's has very good food.  The atmosphere is casual and the service very good. Unfortunately, Mitch the owner has passed away, but the family has been able carry-on in great form continuing what has long been a Modesto tradition.

data.title: Great place for dinner!
data.text: We went here the other night with some friends and I must say I had the best filet I have had in a very long time.  Everyone at our table enjoyed their food and the service was fantastic!!

data.title: review
data.text: This was a very good restaurant , The Duck was out of this world. Very friendly staff quiet and clean.

data.title: Delightful Cuisine Inviting Ambiance and Wonderful Service
data.text: The steak was tender and ideally medium-rare, the potatoes were amazing, and the brussell sprouts the best I've had in years. My husband's meal was equally palate-pleasing! Our birthday weekend ended perfectly and we were surprised with a special treat for our special days! Loved every bite and minute of our stay!

data.title: Great Place!
data.text: One of my favorite places to eat lunch, dinner or just hang out with friends! I never order from menu, always order the daily specials!

data.title: Classy place with delish food !!
data.text: Great bar and wine list.  Food is awesome, and they will substitute vegetables or starch items.  Sign up and get coupons on birthdays, etc.

data.title: Wine Tasting
data.text: I really hate to spread the word, because it is nice having a small intimate group of people, but I feel I must.  On Tuesday Night, from 6-8, Tresetti's has been having wine tasting.  For $15.00, you get to sample 6-8 wines from different wineries.  They have also had champagne tasting and vodka tasting.  It's in their wine area that is a very nice relaxed setting.  It's a great place to come for date night, with friends or to meet new ones.  I've had so much FUN, I've tried to make this my weekly event!

data.title: Late Lunch
data.text: Awesome meal and great service. The Calamari and Gumbo is awesome. Always a perfect place to enjoy a meal.

data.title: Lobster Risotto Was Delicios
data.text: This is the place to go for a special occasion as it is pricey. The meal was delicious and the service was excellent. They have a pretty decent wine selection and menu. Think of this place for your next special occasion just bring some money.

data.title: Good Drinks at the Bar
data.text: Haven't had dinner here, just some fries - but many friends ate the ravioli and loved them.  Cocktails are 8-9 dollars at the bar, and quite well made, though the old fashioned should not have any soda water in it, and they fill it to the brim with water.  Alas.  A good place for a post show drink, but the creepy vibe of downtown Modesto makes it less welcoming.

data.title: Great food high quality
data.text: Nice atmosphere gourmet quality meals. The menu on trip advisor is not current. I expected to spend  $ 25 for dinner and realistically it's $40 per person

data.title: Delicious Food, great price!
data.text:
7 of us went in for dinner before a show at the Gallo Center and were pleased with our order and the speed in which we got it. 

I had the prime rib, which was to die for as did a longtime lady friend of mine. Two of us had gumbo and said it was great. My girlfriend had a Caesar salad with grilled prawns, another one had French onion soup and another had the vegetarian lasagna. Every one of us loved our meals and the restaurant was a great place just to talk and relax even though we were on a rushed schedule. 

Our server, Donna, was extremely attentive to us and passed the word to the chef who put a little priority to our order, which was greatly appreciated since we were tight on time before the show.

The prices were great as all seven meals came out to $145. I had my prime rib cooked medium rare which was perfect and my salad came with a balsamic reduced sun dried tomato vinaigrette dressing, which was delicious as well. 

I would heartily recommend Tresetti's as a stop when you're in Modesto for anything or a show at the Gallo Center as it's just down the street a bit, maybe a five minute walk tops.

data.title: Lunch at Tresetti's
data.text: Some friends and I had lunch at Tresetti's on Saturday.  I made the reservation for 11am since their website says they're open at 11am.  (They might update it to 11:30am since my friends were told they open at 11:30am).  We were early enough to beat the lunch crowd.  My friends had Shrimp Scampi and I had the Gourmet Burger since I'm allergic to shrimp.  The food was very good and the server was very courteous and friendly.  It's a nice place to take people to lunch!

data.title: Excellent Lunch with Great Service -- Thanks to Donna!
data.text: We had great lunches with plenty of food well-presented.  The steak and potato salad was delicious and the waitress (Donna) brought an extra dressing for me to try --I used all the dressing it came with and the extra because it tasted so yummy.  My husband had the red beans and rice which he also said was very well done--he's kind of picky about the dish because he makes it himself at home.  I like that they provide two different kinds of bread--a french bread and also, cornbread mini-muffins.  We've been there several times for lunch and the service has been superior.  We only went twice for dinner--one time, the service was great and the other time, slow.  We would not sit in the wine room section again, especially for dinner.  It has been very consistent so we'll be back in a couple of weeks--for LUNCH!

data.title: Upscale dining in downtown.
data.text: Our wedding party had it final meal here before going our separate ways. The decor is very nice. A parking garage is next door. Service was prompt and friendly, substitutions and split plates.were made with a smile. Food was tasty, with no complaints from anyone in our party. We had a private area to ourselves. The restaurant had all the staff sign a wedding card for our new couple, which was a nice touch.

data.title: Great lunch in downtown.
data.text: My friend and I went there for lunch. Our waitress was very quick to get our water and drinks as well as our food. The crab cakes were perfect and loved the tasty sauce for them. Would recommend for lunch anytime.

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Just had a meal before heading to a show.  Service was excellent and considerate of our need to make a show.

data.title: A splendid restaurant-bar-cafe next to a wine shop
data.text: This large restaurant has something for every diner.  One can sit at a private table and have a quiet dinner for two with a friend, or sit at the bar itself or on one of the high-top tables in the bar area to watch the game and nibble on appetisers and salads, or sit outside and view the pedestrian traffic while having coffee or wine with friends.  The bartender is always happy to create a new cocktail depending on what the guest describes is his/her taste.  The cuisine is varied and the food is always fresh. I especially recommend the calamaretti fritti. I usually come here when going to see a performance at either the State Theatre or Gallo Theatre. Parking is available

data.title: Excellent Dinner in the Heart of Modesto!
data.text: You can easily get to Tresetti's from Routes 108, 99 or 132 if you happen to be traveling through and are seeking a nice dinner spot. The first impression is the bread and butter: the bread is warm, soft and delicious; and the butter has a fantastic taste to it. The second impression for me were the crab cakes. Awesome! I went light and added a caesar salad. Wonderfully fresh vegetables, great taste. I finished with the vanilla bean creme brulee. Amazing! Tresetti's was an awesome dinner! I am still thinking about the bread and butter...
